short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to IN2IT social backend and gather relevant social content to create your news story.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IN2IT social is the unique solution provided by Woody Technologies to search from various social networks, storage platforms and websites.
